import re

def convert_string(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    string = re.sub('\\s+', '_', string)
    string = string.replace(' ', '_')
    return string

import re

def convert_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    string = re.sub('\\s+', '_', string)
    string = string.replace(' ', '_')
    return string

import re

def convert_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    string = re.sub('\\s+', '_', string)
    string = string.replace(' ', '')
    return string
